author: Per Johansson
description: Converts prices from any currency to prices in a selectable currency automatically while browsing. Supports $, £, ¥, ؋, ৳, ฿, ៛, ₡, ₦, ₨, ₩, ₪, ₫, €, ₭, ₮, ₱, ₲, ₴, ₵, ₸, ₹, ₺, ₼, ₽, ﷼, etc.
title: Direct Currency Converter for Firefox for Android
name: direct-currency-converter-2-fennec
